lead_paragraph: PETERS--Jacob, 96 years young, passed away June 28, 2014. Loving husband of late Martha Peters and brother of late Paul Peters. His family, son Gary, daughter-in-law Nancy, grandchildren Andrew and Natalia, Meredith and Sean and step-grandchildren Tara and Jordan, Keri and Paul and all of his great-grandchildren, nieces and nephews will cherish his memory. He was a lifetime reader of this newspaper and enjoyed all that it has had to offer. Decorated WWII veteran. He painfully and loving provided strength, wisdom and support until his last breath. In his last days, he told us "There is no reason that my death cannot be a celebration of life." We shall miss him desperately forever.
